content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment. I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. May I ask what your budget is for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have 700 euros per month for the rental price. Do you have any other conditions that I need to be aware of?

I am 18 years old. I have a Bolivian passport. I have a good credit history. I am a student. I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I am interested in the apartment. I am willing to negotiate the rental price. I want to be able to pay the rent on time and in full.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for sharing that information, Maria. It's great to hear that you have a good credit history and are a responsible tenant. As for the rental price, I believe we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. However, I would like to clarify a few things.

Firstly, the apartment is only 25 square meters, which may not be enough space for you if you plan on living there for an extended period. Additionally, I would like to mention that utilities such as electricity, water, and gas are not included in the rental price. You will be responsible for paying these costs on top of your monthly rent.

That being said, I am willing to negotiate the rental price based on your budget of 700 euros per month. Please let me know what you are willing to offer, and we can work from there.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 600 euros per month for the rental price.

I understand that utilities are not included in the rental price. I will take that into consideration when making my decision.

I am willing to sign a 12-month lease agreement.

I will pay the first month's rent in advance.

I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.

Thank you for your time, Mister Heine.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for your offer, Maria. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and sign a 12-month lease agreement. I am pleased to hear that you will pay the first month's rent in advance and sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.

Based on your offer of 600 euros per month, I am willing to accept your proposal. I believe this is a fair rental price for a 25-square-meter apartment in this location.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before we proceed with the lease agreement. Once everything is finalized, I will provide you with the necessary documents to sign.

Thank you for choosing my apartment, Maria. I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
